messages:
Name: Milot Rashica
Nationality: Kosovo
Date of Birth: June 28, 1996
Position: Midfielder
Current club: Norwich City
Championship clubs played for: Norwich City
Milot Rashica, the Norwich City midfielder, was not involved in the club's first Championship game in 2023/2024.
Rashica last appeared in a competition match on May 30, 2023 for Galatasaray versus Ankaragücü. He created an assist in that encounter for his team in the side's 4-1 victory.
Next up in the league for Norwich City - who are in sixth place in the standings on three points - is a trip to Southampton on August 12.
Rashica played 26 Süper Lig games last season for Galatasaray, scored four goals and provided six assists.
Rashica rejoined Norwich City in July 2023 after a loan spell at Galatasaray, for whom he made 26 league appearances in total, scoring four goals and providing six assists.
